snippet.name: Schema Shell
snippet.starttext: <xs:schema targetNamespace="$${Target Namespace:mysite.net/thing}" xmlns="$${XML Namespace:mysite.net/namespace}" elementFormDefault="$${Form Element:qualified|unqualified}" attributeFormDefault="$${Form Attribute:qualified|unqualified}" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" >
